data.actual_result: The checkbox is there on its own (imgur/L1ftfI1 for screenshot)
data.expected_result: There should be a label to show what the checkbox is there for or the checkbox shouldn't be there.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Missing text in Bot Permissions section of the Bot page on Developers Portal
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an Application - Go to  and hit the "Add Bot" button then confirm with "Yes do it" - Scroll to the Bot Permissions Section and look at the Voice Permissions list. - See the check box with no text next to it to label what the checkbox is for.
